short_summary: Parts & Repair Kits for Compressor & Valve for CFB Esquimalt, BC and CFB Halifax, NS
description: The department is looking for various parts and repair kits for compressors and valves for Canadian forces base Esquimalt, BC and Canadian Forces base Halifax, NS. The requirement is for 12 to 24 units of each type of parts and repair kits. The goods and services needed are for military use and are to be provided by a Canadian company or supplier.
